pkgmetadata.longdescription: .. -*-restructuredtext-*-.. image:: https://github.com/ubernostrum/django-registration/workflows/CI/badge.svg :alt: CI status image :target: https://github.com/ubernostrum/django-registration/actions?query=workflow%3ACIThis is a user-registration application for `Django<https://www.djangoproject.com/>`_.
